title: As a complete beginner, how should I learn programing? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you think that Coding is only for smart people, do watch this:  Also, if you think that you are not smart no one can help that. There are many websites and on-line resources with interactive platform to teach programming in various languages. Choose any language like Python or C/C++ and get started on any of the following: Codecademy - learn to code, interactively, for freeCoursera | Online Courses From Top Universities. Join for FreeedXCode.org: Anybody can LearnAfter you gain some confidence, try out some problems on: HackerEarth - Programming challenges and Developer jobsHackerRankProgramming Competition,Programming Contest,Online Computer ProgrammingHope this helps.
